- Bug fixes related to friend invite and inbox messages

All New Update for June.
Thanks for our community for their awesome feedback !

New Features
- Now find already available Game rooms using our Browse Feature
- Include your Clan Members in Private and Public Match Filters
- Our Battle Cases and Parts Cases are a lot more rewarding
- Game Over Screens also show Clan Names.

- Added support for multiple custom regions all across the world. Now you can select a region closer to you and invite friends to a local match. Lasts for one session.

- Bug fix related to some players going to wrong region on first time flow

Our Biggest Release Yet !
- All New Controls and Framerate Optimization
- Game Now Runs smoother across all devices , thanks to our devs who have been optimizing the game constantly
- Our First Time User Experience is now simpler and smoother
- All Cases are a lot more rewarding now

Thanks for all your support as we now have over 1.5 Million Players who are playing MaskGun !
Special Thanks to All our Clans and Leaders for your awesome support !

February 2018 Update
1. Quick Play

All New June Release
- Lots of GamePlay Changes. Read Closely

Medkit
- You now have the option to heal yourself during combat.

Awesome New Weapons Added
- Rifle - BMR
- SMGs - SR3 Vikhr, PPSH, Changfeng
-New Weapon Skin Dragunov - White Owl

Crafting Removed
- Crafting has been around for a while but it does not fit into the current system of weapon progression in a meaningful way.
Hence after a lot of thought and feedback we have decided to disable the feature.
We are removing parts from your inventory for a while, they are still part of your account and are in safekeeping for now.
Crafted weapons will now be treated as weapon skins under a new category "Unique".
All weapon specific skins will now be moved to this "Unique" category.
Unique skins can be directly purchased with diamonds.

Rebalanced weapons
- All the weapons have been tweaked to enhance performance and balance.
- We now support weapon classes, choose the weapon that suits your playstyle.
- You may gain some levels to fit you into a suitable matchmaking tier depending on the weapons you own.

Gun Upgrades
- All upgrades are now level locked.

Armour and Health
- Armour will now be upgradeable upto 5 times.
- The current 3 armors(ballistic, combat, battle) will now become common armor skins.
- Health bar color has changed to green
- Armor bar is back, it will be displayed in yellow.

Mission Rewards
- We have improved mission rewards.

Now our June update got even better !!
Thanks for all your Feedback !

Rebalanced weapons
All weapons have been tweaked for faster kills !

Check our our New Weapons
Rifle - XM8, F2000

Get the All New Weapon Skin
BMR - Valkyrie

Kit Up with our New Mask and Armor Skins
- Darklord Set
- Biker Set

Medkit Changes
- Medkit healing has been significantly improved.

New Store Changes
We have revamped the store to improve accessibility.

New Offer Packs
We have added multiple new offer packs.
This is a bug fix release for offers and bomb defusal

July 2018 Update
All New Release for July

3. Get that all new look with our new Mask and Armor Skin - The Infiltrator

Major August Update !
Thank you for all your feedback.
We have made the following updates in the game .

1. New Game Lobby System
- Play with friends as a team with the new lobby

2. GamePlay Changes
- Matches are now 5 Minutes
- You can now carry multiple weapons to a battle with More Weapon Slots
- Notified when a new weapon and upgrade unlocks

3. Grenade and Med Kits
- New grenade and med kit store

Critical Bug Fixes related to game not starting.

Update v2.34

*Welcome to Battle Pass Season 1, a new way to play the game and unlock awesome rewards.
*Play games and complete challenges to unlock loads of new Masks, Vests, Pants, Gun Skins, Melee Weapons and goodies.
*Top the Battle Pass Season 1 leaderboards and earn rewards.

Emotes!

- Emotes can be found in cases or purchased for shards.

Pants Customization
- 20 new pant skins have been added to customize your character.
- These new pant skins can be collected through cases or purchased for shards.

Facebook Friends
- You can now add and play with your facebook friends.
- Get rewards for inviting Facebook friends to Mask Gun.

Home Screen
- The home screen has been completely overhauled.
- Battle Cases can now directly be managed from the home screen.

Social Button
- There is now a new "Social" button on the home screen which is used to access the Social menus.
- You can access the "Friends", "Clans", "Inbox" and "Community" from here.

- An emote button has been added to play emotes.

May 2019 Update

Update v2.330 is here and it comes with a few new additions.

ARMOR SYSTEM OVERHAUL!
You can now upgrade 3 types of armors: Mask, Vest and Pants.
The 3 armor types share the same booster, which is applied on the total armor value provided by them.

• “Masks” provide armor and head shot damage reduction.
• The “Vest” provides a large amount of armor.
• “Pants” provide armor and leg damage reduction.

MORE REWARDS
• You can now collect 5 grenades and 5 med kits every 10 minutes on the home screen.
• You can now double your weekly rewards.

Various other bug fixes.

IronSight - Our New Rumble
We now have a Aim Down Sight mode available for 4 new weapons in this release
- Weapons will be inaccurate when shooting in hip firemode.
- In order to gain accuracy, tap on the new aim/crosshair button placed in the UI to shoot in aim down sight (ADS) view.
- Once in aim down sight view, track the enemies and the gun will automatically shoot
- New ADS weapons are MTP-76, L2A1, Jackhammer & the trusted S&W

A new Rumble is here Double Trouble
Shotguns and Pistol in the same Rumble on our favorite Mayan Map.
Use your favorite DP-12 and DEagle for the whole Close Quarter Combat, weapon swapping mayhem.
Get your favorite skins in our Double Trouble Pack available during the rumble only.

Weapon balancing updates
We are always monitoring weapon balance changes and continue to iterate and make things better with time. Here are the changes for December.

Sniper: Sniper's mobility will be slightly altered in a more intuitive way.
Scoping in with a sniper is will no longer let you walk around at full speed.

Heavy: Further improvised Shotgun values in game.
Shotguns will still be lethal at close range will be very ineffective in the mid-range or long range.
Shotgun - Damage Reduced, Effective Range reduced
Shotgun - Spread Increased, accuracy reduced

UI Updates and Fixes
Our First-person character has been improved
HUD - Overall size of the grenade and healing button is increased by 20%

Again, Happy Holidays Everyone from all of us here at MaskGun.
